itemDescription: Irish journalist and Serbian patriot; married Serbian military officer

wikipedia_page.main: Elizabeth Christitch (pen name, Ben Hurst; 1861 – 26 January 1933) was an Irish and Serbian journalist, writer, poet, translator and patriot.

response: *Elizabeth Christitch (1861–January 26, 1933), Irish journalist, writer, poet, translator and Serbian patriot.
